content: Ismael, feeling tired and spiritually unanchored amidst many positive changes, seeks to harmonize his life and connect his actions to a deeper purpose rooted in the Baháʼí Faith. He struggles with ADD and Pathological Demand Avoidance, hindering consistent prayer and meditation. The assistant suggests a gentle approach, focusing on small, pressure-free steps, like simply opening his prayer book. They discussed shifting from obligation to permission regarding morning spiritual practice and identifying a "north star" for his actions. The conversation concluded with a prayer and a quote to inspire gentle reconnection with spiritual practice and self-reflection.
